```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
```

```{r}
data(diamonds)

diamonds_5c <- subset(diamonds, carat == 0.5)

```
There are 1,258 observations in the new dataset.

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(data = diamonds_5c, aes(x = cut)) +
  geom_bar() + 
  labs(title = "Party Size", 
       x = "", y = "")


```
